effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove inning Streak!
Set: When you lose your inning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 7,489 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 89,448 Nature damage over 8 sec.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,786 to 4,627 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,627 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
